tool.name: Scater Filter QC metrics
tool.description: Filter based on QC metrics from serialized scater R object
tool.command:
ln -s '$R_scater_qc' R_scater_qc.rds;
scater-filter.R -i '$R_scater_qc' #if $subset_cell_variables: -s '$subset_cell_variables' #end if #if $low_cell_thresholds: -l '$low_cell_thresholds' #end if #if $n_cells_counts: -t '$n_cells_counts' #end if #if $min_feature_n_cells_counts: -m '$min_feature_n_cells_counts' #end if -o '$R_scater_filtered' #if $cell_filter_matrix: -u '$cell_filter_matrix' #end if #if $feature_filter_matrix: -v '$feature_filter_matrix' #end if

param.name: R_scater_qc
param.help: A serialized SingleCellExperiment object file in RDS format.

param.name: subset_cell_variables
param.help: Comma-separated parameters to subset on. Any variable available in the colData of the supplied object.

param.name: low_cell_thresholds
param.help: Comma-separated low cutoffs for the parameters (default is -Inf).

param.name: n_cells_counts
param.help: Comma-separated parameters to subset on. Any variable available in the colData of the supplied object.

param.name: min_feature_n_cells_counts
param.help: Comma-separated low cutoffs for the parameters (default is -Inf).
